item.title: Thousand Ant
item.description: I work with Thousand Ant and create educational videos/technical scripts to explain new tech and features for their end users. Thousand Ant At Thousand Ant, I had the opportunity to create technical demos demoing some techniques game developers can use in their games with Unity. Flocking with the C# Job System C# Job System: Using DOTS with Managed C# APIs Unity Technologies Physics Optimizations Shader Graph Feature Video
